title: BLACKPINK’s LISA Wants to Work With Doja Cat | Billboard News
description: LISA is releasing her new album soon, and she shares that she wants to work with Doja Cat. Keep watching for more!  Tetris Kelly: Lisa and Doja Cat? We’ll take it. The BLACKPINK star wants to work with that woman and fans are lining up. LaLaLisa revealed to Audacy she wants to work with Doja […]
author: Katie Cao
excerpt: LISA is releasing her new album soon, and she shares that she wants to work with Doja Cat. Keep watching for more!
text: LISA is releasing her new album soon, and she shares that she wants to work with Doja Cat. Keep watching for more!  Tetris Kelly: Lisa and Doja Cat? We’ll take it. The BLACKPINK star wants to work with that woman and fans are lining up. LaLaLisa revealed to Audacy she wants to work with Doja and she’s had quite the features lately. But outside of Rosalía, she used an iconic sample on “Moonlit Floor,” she discussed that with Audacy as well. We love Lisa. More from her with Billboard coming soon.
html:
LISA is releasing her new album soon, and she shares that she wants to work with Doja Cat. Keep watching for more! 

Tetris Kelly:

Lisa and Doja Cat? We’ll take it. The BLACKPINK star wants to work with that woman and fans are lining up. LaLaLisa revealed to Audacy she wants to work with Doja and she’s had quite the features lately. But outside of Rosalía, she used an iconic sample on “Moonlit Floor,” she discussed that with Audacy as well. We love Lisa. More from her with Billboard coming soon.
